name: Beat the Trump: Mexican Edition
description:
You know you are not going anywhere but to the top of your own hill. To get there, just... Beat the Trump!

Beat the Trump Mexican Edition is the new politic/cathartic video game.

Fight the Trump and his rants about Mexicans with a mariachi hat, a delicious taco, a Calavera, a Lucha Libre mask or… with himself!

Beat the Trump has five difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane and Enchilada.

Save your highest scores, share with friends and find out who is away from the Trump reach.

https://www.facebook.com/beatthetrump/

www.facebook.com/backroomgaming/
